name: ZCore Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: ZCore Finance is Binance Smart Chain yield farming bundled with an advanced crypto card with integrated burning mechanism. Provide liquidity, stake LPs and earn instant rewards in deflationary token ZEFI. We are the first DEX and yield farming with real world utility!
